data.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
data.meta_description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.
data.text:
True crime. Real justice. "48 Hours" is the one to watch on Saturday nights. Join us for back-to-back shows all summer. Our crime time double feature starts at 9/8c.

HOW TO WATCH:

"48 Hours" airs Saturdays starting at 9/8c on CBS and streaming on Paramount+.

Can't watch us live? Set your DVR!

You'll also find us on CBS News 24/7 Wednesdays at 8 p.m. ET. Download the CBS News app on your cellphone or connected TV.

Watch more full episodes of "48 Hours" on Pluto TV.

We are on YouTube, too!

Listen to our podcasts: "48 Hours," "My Life of Crime," "Post Mortem" and more.

NEW: CRIME TIME DOUBLE FEATURE

"48 Hours" brings you back-to-back episodes all summer long starting Saturdays at 9/8c. This week, "48 Hours" looks back at cases where homes turned into murder scenes.

SATURDAY, AUG. 10, 2024 | MURDERS BEHIND CLOSED DOORS

9/8c: What Happened in Apartment 4C?: When a man goes missing, his friends turn to social media to track his final hours. What they learn is horrific. "48 Hours" correspondent Eri Moriarty reports.

WATCH A SNEAK PEEK

"He was one of a kind" say friends of Joey Comunale

Murder victim's girlfriend: "Watch who you're with"

James Rackover brags he'll beat charges in phone calls from jail

Friends of Connecticut man missing in NYC use social media to track his final steps

10/9c: Death at the Front Door: Who Shot Heidi Firkus?: A frantic 911 call captures the sound of a gunshot as a couple reports a break-in. How did the intruder disappear? "48 Hours" contributor Jamie Yuccas reports.

WATCH A SNEAK PEEK

Who killed Heidi Firkus? Her husband Nick says he didn't do it.

Did embarrassment of losing a home to foreclosure lead to murder?

Heidi Firkus' fatal shooting captured on her 911 call to report an intruder

SATURDAY, AUG. 3, 2024 | KILLER CREATURES: "48 Hours" looks back at murders blamed on animals.

9/8c: Cold-Blooded Killer: A father goes hunting in a Florida lake and vanishes. Many thought he was eaten by alligators - not his mother. Seventeen years later, stunning courtroom revelations: it was murder. "48 Hours" correspondent Richard Schlesinger reports.

STREAM NOW

Mother a driving force as jury finds answers to Florida man's 2000 disappearance

10/9c: The Poisonous Wife: A star snake breeder is murdered. Turns out the human closest to him was more cold-blooded than any snake. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

STREAM NOW

Ben Renick case: A look at the murder of the world-renowned snake breeder

A snake is eyed as the culprit in man's death until cops realize it can't pull a trigger

"Rock star" reptile breeder murdered; Coroner says "This was not just a random act"

SATURDAY, JULY 27, 2024 | Unsolved: "48 Hours" looks back at murders waiting to be solved.

9/8c: Solve this Case: Who Killed Kay Wenal?: Help solve a murder case: a former model brutally killed in her Georgia home. Someone out there knows something ... is it you? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Kay Wenal murder: Crime scene and clues

Search for killer, and motive, in unsolved 2008 Georgia slaying

Georgia investigators seek public's help in solving former model Kay Wenal's cold case murder

10/9c: Stephen Smith: A Death in Murdaugh Country: New evidence discovered after Murdaugh murders reignites a cold case. "48 Hours" obtains findings of independent forensic experts. CBS News national correspondent Nikki Battiste reports.

STREAM NOW

Timeline: The mysterious death of Stephen Smith in Murdaugh country

VIDEO: How did SC teen Stephen Smith die? "48 Hours" obtains findings of independent investigation

Could cellphone evidence be the key to solving Stephen Smith's cold case?

What do Stephen Smith's injuries tell about the SC teen's death? New findings revealed.

SATURDAY, JULY 20, 2024 | SEEING DOUBLE: "48 Hours" looks back at dead-ringer murderers.

9/8c: The Devil's Twin: A young mother is dead and identical twin brothers are the suspects. Did studying TV crime shows help them come close to pulling off the perfect crime? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Identical twin brothers nearly pull off perfect crime

Solving a crime when identical twins are the suspects

Will Colorado mom Heather DeWild's killer get away with murder?

10/9c: The Plot to Kill Dr. Sievers: Did a Florida man hire a look-alike to kill his wife? A GPS leads police right to the hitman's door. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Evidence in the murder of Dr. Teresa Sievers

"Dumb and dumber": How GPS led cops to killers of Florida doctor

Did a Florida man hire a look-alike to kill his wife?

SATURDAY, JULY 13, 2024 | DRESSED TO KILL: "48 Hours" looks back at murderers known for their disguises.

[48 Hours" was preempted for some viewers due to breaking news]

9/8c: Murder by Clown: How a killer dressed like a clown murdered a mom and almost got away with it. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

WATCH A SNEAK PEEK

Timeline: Catching a killer clown

How law enforcement solved the case of a killer dressed as a clown

10/9c: Unmasking the Zombie Hunter: How police connected the murders of two young women to a man known as a zombie-fighting comic book hero. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

WATCH A SNEAK PEEK

Timeline: The case against the Zombie Hunter

How an undercover sting at a Phoenix Chili's restaurant led to the capture of canal killer

SATURDAY, JULY 6, 2024 | BEACHSIDE HOMICIDE: "48 Hours" looks back at seaside slayings.

9/8c: Murder on the Cape: "48 Hours" has covered the case of A-list fashion writer Christa Worthington, murdered on Cape Cod, since 2006. The man convicted of killing her continues to fight for his freedom."48 Hours" correspondent Susan Spencer reports.

STREAM NOW

Who killed Cape Cod mom Christa Worthington?

10/9c: Blood in the Sand: Two teens killed on the same California beach six years apart. DNA on one of the victims leads to two suspects -- one of them worked for the police.

STREAM NOW

California beach cold case murders continue to haunt

Family shares memories of Barbara Nantais

Were the murders of California teens the work of a serial killer?

SATURDAY, JUNE 29, 2024 | MURDER OFF CAMPUS: "48 Hours" looks back at college students' lives cut short.

9/8c: Fighting for Aniah: College student Aniah Blanchard had a deep fear of being kidnapped. When she disappears, UFC fighter Walt Harris battles for justice for his stepdaughter. CBS News special correspondent James Brown reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Inside the investigation to find college student Aniah Blanchard

Slain stepdaughter appears in dream to UFC fighter Walt Harris, inspiring him to fight again

Family fights for justice and a new law after murder of UFC star's stepdaughter

10/9c: The Night of the Idaho Student Murders: The family of murdered student Kaylee Goncalves says they may have uncovered a connection between the suspect, their daughter, and Madison "Maddie" Mogen. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

STREAM NOW

Idaho student murders: A timeline of the killings and investigation

Father of Kaylee Goncalves, one of four murdered University of Idaho students, says there is evidence his daughter fought back

Idaho student murders suspect Bryan Kohberger followed victims on Instagram, says family

Mother of Idaho murders victim Kaylee Goncalves says evidence shows she was "trapped"

SATURDAY, JUNE 22, 2024 | SECRETS AND LIES: "48 Hours" looks back at cases involving mysterious secrets.

9/8c: The Pact: A 15-year-old boy goes to a dance and never returns. Teen killers keep a secret for 40 years – until one of them cracks. "48 Hours" correspondent Richard Schlesinger reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Clues and evidence in the John McCabe case

Family of Massachusetts teen John McCabe searches for justice in 1969 murder

10/9c: Jade Janks and the Secret Photos: A woman discovers explicit photos of herself on her stepfather's computer. Soon after, he's found dead. Jade is a likely suspect, but did she do it? "48 Hours" correspondent Tracy Smith reports.

STREAM NOW

Jade Janks left a trail of clues in the murder of Tom Merriman. A look at the evidence.

Did a woman kill her stepdad after finding explicit photos of herself on his computer?

Murder plot revealed in Calif. woman's text messages: "I just dosed the hell out of him"

SATURDAY, JUNE 15, 2024 | SERIAL KILLINGS: "48 Hours" looks back at cases involving serial killings.

9/8c: Hannibal Unmasked: Three young women murdered and the hunt for a serial killer named Hannibal.

STREAM NOW

Scott Kimball on being a conman, serial killer and more

Three Colorado women murdered and the search for a serial killer named "Hannibal"

10/9c: The Long Island Serial Killings: The bound bodies of four women are found along a desolate stretch of beach. Disturbing new details about the architect police say is a serial killer. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

Long Island serial killings: A timeline of the investigation

VIDEO: Co-worker of Gilgo Beach murders suspect says he unnerved her by tracking her down on vacation

VIDEO: Authorities explain the evidence they say led them to Rex Heuermann

Co-worker: Rex Heuermann once unnerved her by tracking her down on a cruise: "I told you I could find you anywhere"

SATURDAY, JUNE 8, 2024 | SURVIVOR STORIES: "48 Hours" looks back at cases of crime survivors who lived to tell.

9/8c: Sole Survivor: A young girl plays dead to live through a shooting that destroyed her family -- and describes her remarkable story of survival.

STREAM NOW

911: A child's call for help

PHOTOS: Surviving a Texas shootout

Texas girl played dead to survive shooting that killed her family

0/9c: Who Wanted Nicki Lenway Dead?: A crime scene investigator is gunned down in broad daylight. The harrowing scene is captured on surveillance video. Who pulled the trigger? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

Caught on tape: Female crime scene investigator targeted for execution

The attempted murder of Nicki Lenway: A look at the evidence

She survived being shot at point-blank range. Who wanted Nicki Lenway dead?

SATURDAY, JUNE 1, 2024 | KILLER CONTESTANTS: A look back at former game show contestants convicted of murder.

9/8c: Rodney Alcala: The Killing Game: A photographer who was on "The Dating Game" became one of the nation's deadliest serial killers -- eight years after "48 Hours"' first report, new victims emerge. Correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

STREAM NOW

Serial killer Rodney Alcala's secret photos

Former FBI profiler on the psychology of a sexual killer

Serial killer Rodney Alcala's trail of murder

10/9c: The Game Show and the Murder: When Becky Bliefnick was murdered, an answer her husband gave on "Family Feud" years earlier raised eyebrows. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Murder victim Becky Bliefnick voiced fear of her estranged husband prior to her death

Was Becky Bliefnick's killer a shadowy figure seen on a bike before and after her murder?

A former "Family Feud" contestant convicted of wife's murder speaks out: "I'm innocent. I didn't kill Becky."

SATURDAY, MAY 25, 2024 | 10/9c

The Fenn Treasure: Millionaire Forrest Fenn hid a gold-filled chest somewhere in the Rockies and wrote a poem with cryptic clues. Tens of thousands searched for it and five people died trying. A story of obsession. "CBS Mornings" co-host Tony Dokoupil reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: The hunt for Forrest Fenn's treasure

Leo lives! Miracle dog survives after owner dies in Fenn treasure hunt

SATURDAY, MAY 25, 2024 | 9/8C

The Circleville Letters: An anonymous letter writer threatens to expose a town's rumored secrets. Is anyone safe? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: The Circleville letters: You've got hate mail

Anonymous letters threaten to expose an Ohio town's rumored secrets

A LOOK BACK AT SEASON 36

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MAY 18, 2024 | 10/9c

The Puzzling Death of Susann Sills: The wife of a fertility doctor is found dead at the bottom of a staircase. Did her dogs play a role in her death or was the scene staged to cover a murder? "48 Hours" correspondent Tracy Smith reports.

STREAM NOW

Did a topless photo posted online lead a California IVF doctor to kill his wife?

A California doctor said his wife died in an accidental fall. Her injuries told a different story.

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MAY 11, 2024 | 10/9c

The Day My Mother Vanished: When her mother disappears, 7-year-old Nicki Bates begins a lifelong search to find her and bring her killer to justice. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports

STREAM NOW

"Operation Catch a Toe" leads U.S. Marshals to a Texas murder suspect with a distinctive foot

Texas mom's killer is captured after years on the run. Where did he bury her body?

DOUBLE FEATURE | SATURDAY, MAY 11, 2024 | 9/8c

A Stabbing in Colts Neck: A woman outwits a young stranger who attacked her in her own home. What will it take to find him? "48 Hours" contributor Jim Axelrod reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: N.J. woman survives a home invasion where she was brutally stabbed by a young stranger

How a woman, left for dead, survived a violent home invasion: "There's no earthly reason why I'm alive. None."

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MAY 4, 2024 | 10/9c

Massachusetts detective searches gunshot residue testing website 11 days before his wife is shot dead

Kansas murder suspect uses wife's life insurance payout to buy a sex doll

First-ever "psychological autopsy" in a criminal case in Kansas used to determine mindset of fatal shooting victim

SATURDAY, APRIL 27, 2024 | 9/8c

The Case of the Poison Cheesecake: Viktoria Nasyrova is accused of using cheesecake as a murder weapon. Her motive was to steal the identity of Olga, who looks a lot like her. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: A woman is poisoned with a piece of cheesecake. Her lookalike is convicted of attempted murder.

Death By Eye Drops: A caregiver is accused of poisoning her friend with eye drops. She says investigators got it wrong. "48 Hours" contributor Jericka Duncan reports.

The Disappearance of Maddi Kingsbury: A young Minnesota mother goes missing. Her sister turns to TikTok for help. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

STREAM NOW

Suspect in Maddi Kingsbury killing says his threat she would end up like Gabby Petito was a joke

DOUBLE FEATURE | SATURDAY, APRIL 13, 2024 | 9/8c

Where is Diana Duve?: When a woman disappears with her boyfriend, investigators dig deeper into his past. Mike Jones worked in wealth management and was entrusted with millions, but he also told outlandish lies about who he was.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: How investigators solved a missing person's case-turned murder investigation in 5 days

Man got glowing performance review for "strong ethics;" months later he was charged with murdering ex-girlfriend

Slain nurse's murder investigation uncovers her killer's criminal past, web of lies

, 2024

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, APRIL 6, 2024 | 10/9c

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: The evidence presented at Michelle Troconis' murder conspiracy trial

Michelle Troconis, convicted of conspiracy in Jennifer Dulos murder, was "fooled" by boyfriend, says sister

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MARCH 30, 2024 | 10/9c

The Troubled Case Against Jane Dorotik: A woman convicted of murdering her husband discovers serious problems with some key evidence used against her at trial. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

California woman says her bloody bedroom was not a crime scene

California woman's conviction for murdering her husband overturned after two decades in prison

SATURDAY, MARCH 30, 2024 | 9/8c

Who Poisoned Angela Craig?: A mother of six becomes deathly ill with unusual symptoms. Investigators suspect she was murdered with a poison protein shake."48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

STREAM NOW

How a suspicious package delivered to a Colorado dentist's office sparked a murder investigation

A Colorado dentist is accused of his wife's murder. Did he poison her protein shakes?

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MARCH 23, 2024 | 10PT (Preempted on the east coast due to NCAA basketball.)

Who Poisoned Angela Craig?: A mother of six becomes deathly ill with unusual symptoms. Investigators suspect she was murdered with a poison protein shake."48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

STREAM NOW

How a suspicious package delivered to a Colorado dentist's office sparked a murder investigation

SATURDAY, MARCH 16, 2024 | 10:29 p.m. ET/9:29c (BASKETBALL DELAY)

Lamar Johnson: Standing in Truth: A man gets his life back after spending 28 years in prison for a crime he did not commit. "48 Hours" investigates and is there as Johnson is freed in time to walk his daughter down the aisle. Correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

STREAM NOW

PHOTOS: Lamar Johnson's 28-year fight for freedom

VIDEO: Lamar Johnson's final chance for freedom: Inside the courtroom

VIDEO: Man convicted of murder despite being nowhere near the crime scene

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MARCH 9, 2024 | 10/9c

The Monica Sementilli Affair: When a renowned hairstylist is killed poolside, investigators look at his wife. Was her alleged affair with her racquetball coach a motive for murder? "48 Hours" contributor Michelle Miller reports.

STREAM NOW

Convicted killer Robert Baker says his ex-lover Monica Sementilli had no part in the murder of her husband Fabio

Did Monica Sementilli conspire with the man she was having an affair with to murder her husband?

Monica Sementilli says she did not help plan the murder of her LA beauty exec husband. Will a jury believe her?

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, MARCH 2, 2024 | 10/9c

The Menendez Brothers' Fight for Freedom: The Menendez brothers were given life sentences for gunning down their own parents. Now they're hoping new evidence could reopen the case. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

STREAM NOW

Inside the story of the notorious Menendez brothers case

Menendez brothers await a decision they hope will free them

Menendez brothers' claims of abuse supported by newly discovered letter, new allegation. Will their convictions stand?

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, FEB. 24, 2024 | 10/9c

The People v. Kouri Richins: When her husband is found dead of an apparent overdose, Kouri Richins writes a children's book about grief. Soon after she's charged with his murder. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

STREAM NOW

Kouri Richins' hopes of flipping Utah mansion flop after she is charged in the death of her husband Eric

Did Utah mom Kouri Richins poison her husband, then write a children's book on coping with grief?

A Utah mom is charged in her husband's death. Did she poison him with a cocktail?

DOUBLE FEATURE | SATURDAY, FEB. 24, 2024 | 9/8c

Alisa Mathewson's Night Terrors: A woman is attacked in her sleep and kidnapped by her estranged husband. The dramatic story of her captivity and rescue. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

STREAM NOW

Florida father told 14-year-old daughter to drive her younger siblings home as he abducted their mother

PHOTOS: Alisa Mathewson's 55 hours of terror

Florida mom describes rescue after being held captive by estranged husband: "I'd been pulled from hell"

The Assassination of Jeff German: A Las Vegas journalist is stabbed to death while investigating claims a boss was toxic. Did his reporting make him a target? "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

PHOTOS: Inside the arrest of Nevada public official Robert Telles

Timeline: The suspicious death of Amie Harwick

Amie Harwick's killer "wanted to make a statement by killing her on Valentine's Day," says prosecutor

DOUBLE FEATURE | SATURDAY, FEB. 10, 2024 | 9/8c

Christy and Hilda's Last Dance: After a night out, two women were dumped outside hospitals by masked men. Were the men good Samaritans or did they play a role in the women's deaths? "48 Hours" contributor Jonathan Vigliotti reports.

Husband pieces together wife's last movements to find out how she was killed

The heartbreaking last photo a fashion model sent to her husband

Digital evidence leads to clues in deaths of two friends who were drugged and dumped outside LA hospitals by masked men

Who Took Our Dad? The Abduction of Ray Wright: A family man abruptly vanishes. Police tie his disappearance to a monstrous plot for revenge. Natalie Morales reports.

STREAM NOW

Sacramento family man Ray Wright is abducted. A soda cup leads to his kidnappers.

Incriminating letter points to the kidnapping of Sacramento father, say prosecutors

Where's Ray Wright? High-speed chase leads to clues in Sacramento man's abduction and "revenge" murder

ALL NEW | SATURDAY, JAN. 27, 2024 | 10/9c

Capturing Moriah Wilson's Killer: A promising young athlete is murdered. Her suspected killer disappears and an international manhunt by the U.S. Marshals begins. "48 Hours" contributor Jonathan Vigliotti reports.

STREAM NOW

Plastic surgery helped murder suspect Kaitlin Armstrong stay on the run

How was fugitive Kaitlin Armstrong caught? She answered U.S. Marshals' ad for a yoga instructor

The Mysterious Death of Tiffiney Crawford: A young mother found dead in her car. Could she have shot herself twice? "48 Hours" contributor David Begnaud reports.

STREAM NOW

Medical examiner on Alabama mom's death: "That was concerning to me"

Alabama husband wouldn't answer this question when calling 911 to report wife shot

For the Love of Cayley Mandadi: After their daughter's violent death, a mother and stepfather track down the suspect's car for answers. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

Shootout at the Shaughnessys': A gunfight in the dead of night. The targets fire back. Their son in the crosshairs of suspicion. "48 Hours" contributor Jim Axelrod reports.

STREAM NOW

Wife of slain Austin jeweler says daughter-in-law Jaclyn Edison got away with murder

Why did someone want Texas couple Ted and Corey Shaughnessy dead?

Texas jeweler and dog killed in targeted hit involving son, daughter-in-law

The Suspicious Death of Megan Parra: When a mother of two is found dead in her home, her father obtains death scene photos that help solve the case. "48 Hours" contributor David Begnaud reports.

STREAM NOW

Evidence photos in the death of Louisiana mother Megan Parra

Photos key in Louisiana family's quest to prove Megan Parra's death was a homicide

SATURDAY, JAN. 6, 2024 | 9/8c

Kassanndra's Secret: A young woman vanishes. Eerie surveillance video captures a man in a hat. Investigators learn the two are linked by a secret. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

SATURDAY, DEC. 30, 2023 | 10/9c

Lori Vallow Daybell: Guilty: A jury in Idaho found Lori Vallow Daybell guilty on all charges, including the murders of her two children and conspiracy to commit murder in the death of her husband's first wife. "48 Hours" contributor Jonathan Vigliotti takes you inside the case that gripped the nation.

STREAM NOW

What did Lori Vallow Daybell do? A full timeline of the "doomsday mom" case

Lori Vallow Daybell guilty of unimaginable crimes

The Search for Christie Wilson: She was last seen leaving a casino. How her mom and detectives teamed up to find her body hidden for 15 years. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.
